name: record generic-vnf relationship ROLLBACK
xml:
<record plugin="org.onap.ccsdk.sli.core.sli.recording.Slf4jRecorder">
<parameter name="logger" value="message-log"/>
<parameter name="field1" value="ROLLBACK availability-zone relationship"/>

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
<parameter name='error-code' value='500' />
<parameter name='error-message' value="`'volume-group not found in AnAI with volume-group-id=' + $ss.param.volume-group-id  + '; ' + $error-message`" />

name: return failure
xml:
<return status='failure'>
<parameter name='error-code' value='500' />
<parameter name='error-message' value="`' Failed to create vf-module relationship for vnfc with vnfc-name =' + $ss.param.vnfc-name + ' in AnAI. ' + $error-message`" />
